name: City Limo Driving
description:
Do you want to be a real limo car hero driver and drive around town in a luxurious Limo car? Drive and park your car as an expert driver while people stare at your royal limousine?

Enjoy the luxury life of a limo driver who picks & drop celebrities in parties and shows and government officials and diplomats to conferences and grand royal people to their hotels all around the grand city.

Features:
• Variety of Limo Cars to Drive and Park
• Superb Big City
• Amazing Chance to Improve your Driving and Parking Skills
• Pick and Drop Royal People of Big City
• Realistic Car Physics, Smooth Controls & Engaging Sound Effects
